title: r/Storiesaboutkevin Kevin Tries To Pet a Hungry Lion!
description:
r/Storiesaboutkevin In today's episode, OP lives in South Africa and goes on a Jeep safari with a female Kevin (a Kevina). This woman is beyond stupid! She's so stupid that when their Jeep comes across a wild lion... she tries to pet it! And it's not like this lion was asleep or something -- it was actively hunting prey. Luckily, the safari leader wouldn't let the Kevina exit the vehicle and approach the feral, hunting lion to give it some cuddles. If you like this podcast and want to see more, follow my podcast for more daily Reddit content!
